metadata.name: NOSTALGIA - 1
metadata.description:
NOSTALGIA ARTWORK DESCRIPTION: 

Do you ever find yourself reminiscing about the weekend summer afternoons playing by the beach with your friends? 

Do you still remember what the warm sand felt like? 

I do and I want to go back...

NOSTALGIA MECHANICS:  

Certain adjacent combinations (in a quantity of 4 or 9) of the ERC-1155 tokens can be burned for a 1/1 ERC-721 token. The artwork in the ERC-721 token will comprise of the artworks from the ERC-1155s, that were burnt in exchange for it. 

The combinations of ERC-1155 eligible for burning in exchange for a 1/1 ERC-721 are:  
- NOSTALGIA - 1, 2, 4, 5  
- NOSTALGIA - 4, 5, 7, 8  
- NOSTALGIA - 2, 3, 5, 6  
- NOSTALGIA - 5, 6, 8, 9  
- NOSTALGIA - 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9

Note that only one ERC-721 token can ever be minted from the NOSTALGIA series. It will be on a first-come-first-serve basis. If someone has already redeemed the 1/1 ERC-721 NOSTALGIA by collecting and burning the corresponding 1155s, future collectors will not have the 1/1 option available to them. 

NOSTALGIA - FRAMES  
by  
ununkx
